text: In those days John the Baptist came into the wilderness of Judea proclaiming,

“<st data-num="3340">Repent</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> is <st data-num="1448">near</st>.”

For he is the one about whom the prophet Isaiah had spoken:

“The voice of one shouting in the wilderness,

‘Prepare the way for the Lord, make his paths straight.’”
Now John wore clothing made from camel’s hair with a leather belt around his waist, and his diet consisted of locusts and wild honey.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> people from <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">as well as</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4066" class="">region around</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2446" class="">Jordan</st>, were <st data-num="1607">going out</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,
and he was baptizing them in the Jordan River as they confessed their sins.
But when he saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to his baptism, he said to them, “You offspring of vipers! Who warned you to flee from the coming wrath?

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">produce</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="514" class="">proves</st> your<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361">don’t</st> <st data-num="1380">think</st> you can <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="1722">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>, ‘We <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> as our <st data-num="3962" class="">father.’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="1453">raise up</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> for <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stones</st>!
Even now the ax is laid at the root of the trees, and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire.
“I baptize you with water, for repentance, but the one coming after me is more powerful than I am—I am not worthy to carry his sandals! He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire.
His winnowing fork is in his hand, and he will clean out his threshing floor and will gather his wheat into the storehouse, but the chaff he will burn up with inextinguishable fire!”
Then Jesus came from Galilee to John to be baptized by him in the Jordan River.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> John<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1254" class="">tried to prevent</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> to be <st data-num="907">baptized</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="863" class="">Let it happen</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4241">right</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473">us</st> to <st data-num="4137">fulfill</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>.” <st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> John<n id="3" /> <st data-num="863" class="">yielded</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

After<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="907">baptized</st>, <st data-num="2117" class="">just as</st> he was <st data-num="305">coming up</st> <st data-num="575">out of</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st> <st data-num="5616" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4058" class="">dove</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> to rest<n id="6" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
And a voice from heaven said, “This is my one dear Son; in him I take great delight.”
